metadata.title: curl: Usage of disabled protocol (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in curl. When a protocol selection parameter disables all protocols without adding any, the default set of protocols remains in the allowed set due to a logic error, allowing usage of disabled protocols. 
            STATEMENT: The curl package as shipped in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6, 7, 8, 9, and RHSCL is not affected by this vulnerability because the vulnerable code was introduced in a newer version of curl.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jbcs-http24-curl is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
